pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Life Insurance Rate-Making System // Design of non-life insurance rate-making system with a frequency and a severity component based on the a posteriori criteria. The rate-making system is a general form of bonus-malus system introduced by Lemaire (1995), doi:10.1007/978-94-011-0631-3 and Frangos and Vrontos (2001), doi:10.2143/AST.31.1.991.
